channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Tech Now
channel.desc: Alasdair Keane explores the tech highlights at IFA Berlin, one of the world's biggest consumer tech events. Adrienne Murray visits an advanced recycling plant in Stockholm which uses lasers and AI to sort plastic waste. Plus, Andrew Rogers heads to VeXpo in Birmingham to find out about the huge rise in popularity of VTubers, or virtual anime YouTubers.
